thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Anne Baldwin

author: Anne Baldwin
title: Anne Baldwin
text: We have used Trusted house sitters four times now and each time have had complete confidence in our sitters. This has enabled us to leave our home for up to six weeks while we are away knowing that there is someone looking after and caring for the place. Our two cats are much happier being at home and not shunted off to a cattery - however good that was - and have often bonded with the sitters. We now have total peace of mind while away from home.
